robocode.robotinterfaces

Interface ITeamEvents

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RateControlRobot, TeamRobot

    public interface ITeamEvents
    An event interface for receiving robot team events with an ITeamRobot.
    Since:
    1.6
    Author:
    Pavel Savara (original), Flemming N. Larsen (contributor)
    See Also:
    ITeamRobot

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMessageReceived(MessageEvent event)
      This method is called when your robot receives a message from a teammate.

    • Method Detail

      • onMessageReceived

        void onMessageReceived(MessageEvent event)
        This method is called when your robot receives a message from a teammate. You should override it in your robot if you want to be informed of this event.

        Example: 

           public void onMessageReceived(MessageEvent event) {
       out.println(event.getSender() + " sent me: " + event.getMessage());
   }
        Parameters:
        event - the message event sent by the game
        See Also:
        MessageEvent, Event
